author: Ainsley Harriott
method: Heat the oil in a large pan for deep frying. (CAUTION: Hot oil can be very dangerous. Do not leave unattended.) Cut the pastry sheets into four lengthways.  Mix the apple, raisins, pistachios, orange zest and cinnamon.  Place a small amount into the corner of the pastry and fold into triangles.  Seal with butter and repeat with the rest of the pastry and filling. Deep fry for 2-3 minutes or until golden. Serve.
ingredients: oil for deep frying,  2 sheets filo pastry,  1 apple, peeled and sliced,  50g/1¾oz raisins,  50g/1¾oz pistachios,  1 orange, zest only,  pinch cinnamon,  butter for greasing
